text.children: You can add a sound recording, an image and a video to any input label or to a note.

bind.jr:constraintMsg: option c and d cannot be selected together

input.label:
This form showcases the different available _widgets_.
The hints explain how these widgets were created. The form logo was added by simply uploading a file called form_logo.png in the Media section of the form settings page in formhub.
The XLS Form source is [here](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheet/ccc?key=0Al3Mw5sknZoPdEpPa29tamFCc1o2bmFVR3RaemlSRXc&usp=sharing).
Text widget
input.hint: Can be short or long but always one line (type = text)

input.label: Multiline Text widget in enketo (in ODK collect this a normal text field)
input.hint: Can be multiple lines (type=text, appearance = multiline)

input.label: Integer widget (try entering a number > 10)
input.hint: This field has a constraint (type=integer, constraint=.<10)

input.label: Decimal widget (allows only number > 10.51 and < 18.39)
input.hint: This field has a constraint (type=decimal, constraint=. > 10.51 and . < 18.39)

input.label: Distress widget
input.hint: A highly specific widget to measure distress

input.label: Date widget (this one allows only future dates and has a default children)
input.hint: This field has a constraint (type=date, constraint=.>= today())

input.label: Month-year widget
input.hint: Simply specify an appearance style (type=date, appearance=month-year)

input.label: Year widget (year only)
input.hint: Simply specify and appearance style (type=date, appearance=year)

input.label: Time widget
input.hint: Times are easy! (type=time)

input.label: Date and time widget
input.hint: For exact times, will be converted to UTC/GMT (type=dateTime)

select.label: Select multiple widget (don't pick c and d together)
select.hint: Using a list specified in the choices worksheet (type=select_multiple list)

select.label: Select multiple widget displaying horizontally (in Enketo)
Select one displaying horizontally but in columns (in Enketo)

select1.label: Select one widget
select1.hint: Scroll down to see default selection (type=select_one list2, default=8)

select1.label: Select one displaying compactly and horizontally (in Enketo)
Select one displaying horizontally but in columns (in Enketo)
Spinner widget: select one
select1.hint: Showing a pull-down list of options (type=select_one list, appearance=minimal)

select.label: Spinner widget: select multiple
select.hint: Showing a pull-down list of options (type=select_multiple list, appearance=minimal)

select1.label: Select widget - auto advance
select1.hint: Advance to the next question immediate after selection in ODK Collect. (type=select_one list, appearance=quick)

select1.label: Grid select one widget
select1.hint: Make sure to put a.jpg and b.jpg in the form-media folder to see images here. (type=select_one a_b, appearance=compact)

select1.label: Grid auto-advance widget
select1.hint: Same as previous but this one advances to the next question automatically in ODK Collect. (type=select_one a_b, appearance=quickcompact)

select1.label: Table
select1.hint: Show only the labels of these options and not the inputs (type=select_one yes_no, appearance=label)

select1.label: Q1
select1.hint: Show only the inputs of these options and not the labels (type=select_one yes_no, appearance=list-nolabel)

select1.label: Question 2
select1.hint: Show only the inputs of these options and not the labels (type=select_one yes_no, appearance=list-nolabel)

input.label: Table (alternative method)
input.hint: An alternative way to do almost the same (appearance=table-list) but it will look a bit different.

select1.label: Q1
select1.hint: No need to do anything special here

select1.label: Question 2
select1.hint: No need to do anything special here

select.label: Select mood
select.hint: Show only the labels of these options and not the inputs (type=select_one yes_no, appearance=label)

select.label: Brian
select.hint: Show only the inputs of these options and not the labels (type=select_one yes_no, appearance=list-nolabel)

select.label: Michael
select.hint: Show only the inputs of these options and not the labels (type=select_one yes_no, appearance=list-nolabel)

input.label: Table with image labels (alternative method)
input.hint: An alternative way to do the same (appearance=table-list) but it will look a bit different.

select1.label: City
select1.hint: Using a choice filter to update options based on a previous answer (choice_filter: country = )

select1.label: Neighborhood
select1.hint: Using a choice filter to update options based on previous answers (choice_filter: country = and city = )

select1.label: City
select1.hint: Using a choice filter to update options based on a previous answer (choice_filter: country = , appearance: minimal)

select1.label: Neighborhood
select1.hint: Using a choice filter to update options based on previous answers (choice_filter: country = and city = , appearance = minimal)

input.label: Geopoint widget
input.hint: This will record the gps location. In enketo it also shows a map. (type=geopoint)

input.label: Geopoint with map Widget
input.hint: This will record the gps location. In enketo is is the same as the previous. (type=geopoint, appearance=maps)

input.label: Geopoint widget that hides input data by default
input.hint: To show a larger map (on desktop screens), you can hide the input data. (appearance = hide-input)

input.label: Geotrace widget
input.hint: This will record a sequence/line of geopoints (type=geotrace, appearance=maps hide-input)

input.label: Geoshape widget
input.hint: This will record a closed sequence/polygon of geopoints (type=geoshape, appearance=maps hide-input)

upload.label: Audio widget
upload.hint: This will launch the audio recorder.

upload.label: Video widget
upload.hint: This will launch the video recorder.

input.label: Barcode widget
input.hint: Scans multi-format 1d/2d barcodes. In enketo it allows manual entry (type=barcode)

input.label:
Note widget. In notes you can emphasize _words_ or _multiple words_ or __strongly emphasize something__. You can also use a line break to start a new sentence.
The decimal number you entered was .
input.hint: This is a note and it uses a children of another field in its label (type=note)
Add the file name in the audio column on your survey sheet. Make sure you upload this file when you publish your form.

select1.label: You can also add media to choices. Choose your favorite bird.
select1.hint: Add the file name in the image column on your choices sheet. Make sure you upload this file when you publish your form.

trigger.label: Acknowledge widget
trigger.hint: Prompts for confirmation. Useful to combine with required or relevant. (type=trigger)
